TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ListControl extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl implements class System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl, class System.Web.UI.ITextControl
Public MustInherit Class ListControl Inherits DataBoundControl Implements IEditableTextControl
public ref class ListControl abstract : System::Web::UI::WebControls::DataBoundControl, System::Web::UI::IEditableTextControl

summary.span: 做為定義所有清單類型控制項之通用屬性、方法和事件的抽象基底類別。

span.span: Serves as the abstract base class that defines the properties, methods, and events common for all list-type controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行個體抽象類別不能直接建立。An instance of the abstract class cannot be created directly. 相反地，這個類別會由其他類別繼承，例如， ， ，和類別，以提供通用的基本功能。Instead, this class is inherited by other classes, such as the , , , and classes, to provide common basic functionality. 內容類別可讓您指定來填入清單控制項的資料來源。The properties of the class allow you to specify the source of the data to populate the list control. 使用屬性來指定要繫結清單控制項的資料來源。Use the property to specify the data source to bind to the list control. 如果資料來源包含多個資料表，使用屬性來指定要使用的資料表。If the data source contains more than one table, use the property to specify the table to use. 您可以繫結至資料來源中的不同欄位和藉由設定清單控制項中項目的屬性和屬性，分別。You can bind different fields in the data source to the and properties of the items in the list control by setting the and properties, respectively. 清單控制項中的每個項目可以顯示的文字格式設定屬性。The text displayed for each item in the list control can by formatted by setting the property. 清單控制項中顯示的所有項目會儲存在集合。All items displayed in the list control are stored in the collection. 您可以以程式設計方式指定，或判斷選取的項目在清單控制項中的索引使用屬性。You can programmatically specify or determine the index of a selected item in the list control by using the property. 選取之項目的屬性可使用屬性。The properties of the selected item can be accessed by using the property. 類別提供發佈至伺服器期間變更清單控制項中的選取項目時所引發的事件。The class provides the event, which is raised when the selection in the list control changes between posts to the server. 這可讓您提供此事件的自訂處理常式。This allows you to provide a custom handler for this event. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). 類別會實作介面，因此，衍生清單類型控制項可用於其他控制項的樣板模式。The class implements the interface so that derived list-type controls can be used in the template mode of other controls. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何選取中的項目控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to select items in a control. 如果找到項目在文字方塊中，選取項目，並顯示訊息，指出選取的項目名稱。If the item is found in the text box, the item is selected and a message is displayed stating the name of the selected item. 如果找不到項目，會選取任何項目，並顯示訊息指出找不到項目。If the item is not found, no item is selected and a message is displayed stating that the item was not found. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[ListControlSelectedValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlSelectedValue/CS/listcontrolselectedvaluecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ListControlSelectedValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlSelectedValue/VB/listcontrolselectedvaluevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計的方式The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically 建立控制項。create a control. 此範例會使用控制項做為容器。The example uses a control as a container for the . MemberSignature.Value: protected override void AddAttributesToRender (System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void AddAttributesToRender(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub AddAttributesToRender (writer As HtmlTextWriter)
protected: override void AddAttributesToRender(System::Web::UI::HtmlTextWriter ^ writer);

param.name: writer
param.span: 物件，代表要在用戶端呈現 HTML 內容的輸出資料流。

span.span: An object that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.

summary.span: 會套用 HTML 屬性和樣式以對指定的 物件呈現。

span.span: Applies HTML attributes and styles to render to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控制項開發人員用來插入其他的屬性和樣式到衍生自控制項的輸出資料流類別。The method is used primarily by control developers to insert the additional attributes and styles into the output stream for controls that are derived from the class.

span.span: The method overrides the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool AppendDataBoundItems { get; set; }
.property instance bool AppendDataBoundItems
Public Overridable Property AppendDataBoundItems As Boolean
public: virtual property bool AppendDataBoundItems { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示是否在資料繫結之前清除清單項目。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether list items are cleared before data binding.

value.span: 如果不在資料繫結之前清除清單項目，則為 ；如果要在執行資料繫結之前清除項目集合，則為 。

span.span: if list items are not cleared before data binding; otherwise, , if the items collection is cleared before data binding is performed.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您將項目加入物件之前發生資料繫結。The property allows you to add items to the object before data binding occurs. 資料繫結之後, 從資料來源的項目和先前加入的項目都包含的項目集合。After data binding, the items collection contains both the items from the data source and the previously added items. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何加入資料繫結項目並不是資料繫結中的項目控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to include both data-bound items and items that are not data-bound in a control. 在事件，一個項目加入至集合和屬性設定為`true`。In the event for the , one item is added to the collection and the property is set to `true`. 然後，控制項繫結至控制項。Then, the control is bound to a control. 產生控制項包含的資料繫結項目和已加入個別的項目。The resulting control contains both the data-bound items and the item that was added individually. [!code-aspx-csharp[ListControlAppendDataBoundItems#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlAppendDataBoundItems/CS/AppendItemsCs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ListControlAppendDataBoundItems#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlAppendDataBoundItems/VB/AppendItemsVb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool AutoPostBack { get; set; }
.property instance bool AutoPostBack
Public Overridable Property AutoPostBack As Boolean
public: virtual property bool AutoPostBack { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示當使用者變更清單選取項目時，是否會自動向伺服器回傳。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a postback to the server automatically occurs when the user changes the list selection.

value.span: 如果當使用者變更清單的選取項目時，會自動向伺服器回傳，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if a postback to the server automatically occurs whenever the user changes the selection of the list; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將此屬性設定為`true`如果需要擷取選取項目，因為它由伺服器。Set this property to `true` if the server needs to capture the selection as soon as it is made. 比方說，您可以自動根據使用者的選取項目從清單控制項填入網頁上的其他控制項。For example, other controls on the Web page can be automatically filled depending on the user's selection from a list control. 這個屬性可以用來允許在網頁上，根據使用者的選取清單中的其他控制項的自動母體擴展。This property can be used to allow automatic population of other controls on the Web page based on a user's selection from a list. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何啟用如控制項。The following example demonstrates how to enable for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[ListControlAutoPostBack#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlAutoPostBack/CS/ListControlAutoPostBackcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ListControlAutoPostBack#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlAutoPostBack/VB/ListControlAutoPostBackvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool CausesValidation { get; set; }
.property instance bool CausesValidation
Public Overridable Property CausesValidation As Boolean
public: virtual property bool CausesValidation { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示是否要在按一下衍生自 類別的控制項時執行驗證。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when a control that is derived from the class is clicked.

value.span: 如果按一下 控制項時會執行驗證，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if validation is performed when the control is clicked; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷是否執行驗證時按一下控制項時。Use the property to determine whether validation is performed when a control is clicked. 頁面驗證判斷控制項是否會與驗證相關聯的輸入的控制項在頁面上，所有通過驗證控制項所指定的驗證規則。Page validation determines whether the input controls that are associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules that are specified by the validation control. 根據預設，按一下 衍生自控制項類別不會造成頁面驗證。By default, clicking a control that is derived from the class does not cause page validation. 若要執行頁面驗證控制項時，衍生自按一下類別時，請將屬性`true`。To perform page validation when the control that is derived from the class is clicked, set the property to `true`. 時的值屬性設定為`true`，您也可以使用屬性，以指定的驗證群組名稱的驗證。When the value of the property is set to `true`, you can also use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

summary.span: 清除清單選取項目，並將所有項目的 屬性設為 false。

span.span: Clears out the list selection and sets the property of all items to false.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來重設控制項，以便選取任何項目。Use this method to reset the control so that no items are selected.

summary.span: 取得或設定提供清單項目文字內容的資料來源欄位。

span.span: Gets or sets the field of the data source that provides the text content of the list items.

value.span: 提供清單項目文字內容的資料來源欄位。

span.span: The field of the data source that provides the text content of the list items.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來指定中的欄位屬性顯示為清單控制項中清單的項目。Use this property to specify a field in the property to display as the items of the list in a list control. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何指定如控制項。The following example demonstrates how to specify the for the control. 中顯示的文字。The is the text that is displayed in the . [!code-aspx-csharp[ListControlDataSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDataSource/CS/ListControlDataSourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ListControlDataSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDataSource/VB/ListControlDataSourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string DataTextFormatString { get; set; }
.property instance string DataTextFormatString
Public Overridable Property DataTextFormatString As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ DataTextFormatString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定格式化字串，這個字串可用來控制繫結至清單控制項之資料的顯示方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the formatting string used to control how data bound to the list control is displayed.

value.span: 繫結至控制項之資料的格式化字串。

span.span: The formatting string for data bound to the control.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性清單控制項中的項目提供自訂的顯示格式。Use the property to provide a custom display format the items in a list control. 資料格式字串由兩個部分組成，在表單中，以冒號分隔的 { `A` : `Bxx` }。The data format string consists of two parts, separated by a colon, in the form { `A` : `Bxx` }. 例如，{0: f2} 的格式字串格式化的儲存格，以顯示兩位數的固定的點數。For example, the formatting string {0:F2} would format the cell to display a fixed point number with two decimal places. > [!NOTE] > 整個字串必須括在大括號來表示其為格式字串，而不是常值字串中。The entire string must be enclosed in braces to indicate that it is a format string and not a literal string. 大括號以外的任何文字會顯示為常值文字。Any text outside the braces is displayed as literal text. 冒號之前的值 (`A`一般範例中) 以零為起始的參數清單中，指定的參數索引。The value before the colon (`A` in the general example) specifies the parameter index in a zero-based list of parameters. > [!NOTE] > 只可以將此值設定為 0，因為每個資料格中只能有一個值。This value can only be set to 0 because there is only one value in each cell. 冒號後面的字元 (`B`一般範例中) 指定要顯示值的格式。The character after the colon (`B` in the general example) specifies the format to display the value in. 下表列出常見的格式。The following table lists the common formats. |格式字元Format character|描述Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |`C`|以貨幣格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in currency format.| |`D`|以十進位格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in decimal format.| |`E`|以科學記號 （指數） 格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in scientific (exponential) format.| |`F`|固定格式來顯示數值。Displays numeric values in fixed format.| |`G`|以一般格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in general format.| |`N`|數字格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in number format.| |`X`|以十六進位格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in hexadecimal format.| > [!NOTE] > 格式字元不區分大小寫，除了`X`，其中顯示十六進位字元指定的大小寫。The format character is not case-sensitive, except for `X`, which displays the hexadecimal characters in the case specified. 格式字元後的值 (`xx`一般範例中) 指定有效位數或小數位數，若要顯示的數目。The value after the format character (`xx` in the general example) specifies the number of significant digits or decimal places to display. 下表包含格式字串和結果的範例。The following table contains examples of formatting strings and the results. 它會假設標準英文設定。It assumes standard English settings. |數值Numeric Value|格式字串Format String|結果Result| |-------------------|-------------------|------------| |12345.678912345.6789|"{0:C}""{0:C}"|$12,345.68$12,345.68| |-12345.6789-12345.6789|"{0:C}""{0:C}"|($12,345.68)($12,345.68)| |1234512345|"{0:D}""{0:D}"|1234512345| |1234512345|"{0:D8}""{0:D8}"|0001234500012345| |12345.678912345.6789|"{0:E}""{0:E}"|1234568E+0041234568E+004| |12345.678912345.6789|"{0:E10}""{0:E10}"|1.2345678900E+0041.2345678900E+004| |12345.678912345.6789|"{0:F}""{0:F}"|12345.6812345.68| |12345.678912345.6789|"{0:F0}""{0:F0}"|1234612346| |12345.678912345.6789|"{0:G}""{0:G}"|12345.678912345.6789| |123456789123456789|"{0:G7}""{0:G7}"|1.234568E81.234568E8| |12345.678912345.6789|"{0:N}""{0:N}"|12,345.6812,345.68| |123456789123456789|"{0:N4}""{0:N4}"|123,456,789.0000123,456,789.0000| |12345.678912345.6789|「 總數: {0: c}""Total: {0:C}"|總計: $ 12345.68Total: $12345.68| 如需格式化字串的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化類型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information on formatting strings, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

value.span: 提供每個清單項目值的資料來源欄位。

span.span: The field of the data source that provides the value of each list item.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性，以指定包含在清單控制項中的每個項目值的欄位。Use this property to specify the field that contains the value of each item in a list control. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何指定如控制項。The following example demonstrates how to specify the for the control. 的值中的每個項目。The is the value for the each item in the . [!code-aspx-csharp[ListControlDataSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDataSource/CS/ListControlDataSourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ListControlDataSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDataSource/VB/ListControlDataSourcevb.aspx#1)]

.property instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection Items

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會通知伺服器控制項，執行任何預先呈現的必要步驟，在儲存檢視狀態，以及內容轉譯之前。擴充時，它通常會由控制項開發人員使用類別。This method notifies the server control to perform any necessary prerendering steps prior to saving view state and rendering content .It is generally used by control developers when extending the class. 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.span: This allows you to provide a custom handler for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 發佈至伺服器期間變更清單控制項的選取項目時引發事件。The event is raised when the selection from the list control changes between posts to the server. > [!NOTE] > 清單控制項必須保存發佈至這個事件，才能正確運作的伺服器之間的某些值。A list control must persist some values between posts to the server for this event to work correctly. 請確定已啟用檢視狀態，清單控制項。Be sure that view state is enabled for the list control. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件 以顯示由使用者所做的選擇。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to display the selection made by the user. [!code-aspx-csharp[ListControlDataSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDataSource/CS/ListControlDataSourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ListControlDataSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDataSource/VB/ListControlDataSourcevb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 取得或設定清單中選取項目的最低序數索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the lowest ordinal index of the selected items in the list.

value.span: 清單中選取項目的最低序數索引。

span.span: The lowest ordinal index of the selected items in the list.

value.span: 預設值為 -1，表示沒有選取任何項目。

span.span: The default is -1, which indicates that nothing is selected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來判斷如果清單控制項只允許一個選取的清單中目前選取之項目的索引。Use this property to determine the index of the currently selected item in the list if the list control allows only one selection. 如果清單控制項支援多重選取，請使用這個屬性來判斷最低索引選取的項目。If the list control supports multiple selections, use this property to determine the lowest index of the selected items. 值屬性特別不會儲存在回傳。The value of the property is not specifically saved on postback. 還原回傳使用屬性。It is restored on postback using the property. 例如，如果屬性為 4，在回傳時，屬性設定為索引具有物件4 的屬性。For example, if the property is 4, on postback, the property is set to the index of the object that has a property of 4. 如果有一個以上物件具有4 中的第一個項目屬性選取集合。If more than one object has a property of 4, the first item in the collection is selected. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用決定選取的項目中的最低索引。The following example demonstrates how to use to determine the lowest index of the selected items in the . [!code-aspx-csharp[ListControlSelectedIndex#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlSelectedIndex/CS/ListControlSelectedIndexcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ListControlSelectedIndex#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlSelectedIndex/VB/ListControlSelectedIndexvb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 索引設定為小於 -1，或是大於或等於呈現清單當時清單上的項目數目。

span.span: The index was set to less than -1, or greater than or equal to the number of items on the list at the time the list is rendered.

span.span: Occurs when the selection from the list control changes between posts to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 發佈至伺服器期間變更清單控制項的選取項目時引發事件。The event is raised when the selection from the list control changes between posts to the server. > [!NOTE] > 清單控制項必須保存發佈至這個事件，才能正確運作的伺服器之間的某些值。A list control must persist some values between posts to the server for this event to work correctly. 請確定已啟用檢視狀態，清單控制項。Be sure that view state is enabled for the list control. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件 以顯示由使用者所做的選擇。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to display the selection made by the user. [!code-aspx-csharp[ListControlDataSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDataSource/CS/ListControlDataSourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ListControlDataSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDataSource/VB/ListControlDataSourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得清單控制項中具有最低索引的選取項目。

span.span: Gets the selected item with the lowest index in the list control.

value.span: 代表從清單控制項選取的最低索引項目。

span.span: The lowest indexed item selected from the list control.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果清單控制項可讓單一選項，請使用這個屬性為其取得選取之項目的個別屬性。If the list control allows only a single selection, use this property to get the individual properties of the selected item. 如果清單控制項可讓多個選取項目，請使用這個屬性取得的最低索引項目從清單控制項中選取屬性。If the list control allows multiple selections, use this property to get the properties of the lowest indexed item selected from the list control. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用取得目前選取的項目中的個別屬性並顯示該項目，而且其值。The following example demonstrates how to use to get the individual properties of the currently selected item in the and to display that item and its value. [!code-aspx-csharp[ListControlDataSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDataSource/CS/ListControlDataSourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ListControlDataSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDataSource/VB/ListControlDataSourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string SelectedValue { get; set; }
.property instance string SelectedValue
Public Overridable Property SelectedValue As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ SelectedValue { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得清單控制項中選取項目的值，或選取清單控制項中包含指定值的項目。

span.span: Gets the value of the selected item in the list control, or selects the item in the list control that contains the specified value.

value.span: 清單控制項中選取項目的值。

span.span: The value of the selected item in the list control.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會傳回屬性的所選。This property returns the property of the selected . 屬性通常用來決定選取的項目在清單控制項中的值。The property is commonly used to determine the value of the selected item in the list control. 如果選取多個項目，則會傳回選取的項目具有最低索引的值。If multiple items are selected, the value of the selected item with the lowest index is returned. 如果未不選取任何項目，則為空字串 ("") 會傳回。If no item is selected, an empty string ("") is returned. 屬性也可用來設定項目的值與清單控制項中選取的項目。The property can also be used to select an item in the list control by setting it with the value of the item. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). 當選取的值不在可用值的清單，並執行回傳時，擲回例外狀況。When the selected value is not in the list of available values and a postback is performed, an exception is thrown. 下列範例會示範如何攔截無效的值之前發生回傳時：The following example shows how to catch an invalid value before postback occurs: ```vb Me.DropDownList1.Items.Add(New ListItem( Text="Hello", Value="1" )) If DropDownList1.Items.FindByValue("2") IsNot Nothing Then Response.Write("Found") End If ``` ```csharp this.DropDownList1.Items.Add(new ListItem{ Text="Hello", Value="1" }); if(DropDownList1.Items.FindByValue("2") != null) { Response.Write("Found"); } ``` ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，以選取中的項目控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to select an item in a control. 請注意，這個屬性也可用來擷取選取之項目的值。Notice that this property can also be used to retrieve the value of the selected item. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[ListControlSelectedValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlSelectedValue/CS/listcontrolselectedvaluecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ListControlSelectedValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlSelectedValue/VB/listcontrolselectedvaluevb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 選取的值不在可用的值和檢視狀態的清單中，或者狀態已載入 (已執行回傳)。

span.span: The selected value is not in the list of available values and view state or other state has been loaded (a postback has been performed).

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項的 屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets the property of the control.
The of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性取得並設定相同的值屬性。The property gets and sets the same value that the property does. 屬性通常用來決定選取的項目中的值控制項。The property is commonly used to determine the value of the selected item in the control. 如果未不選取任何項目，則為空字串 ("") 會傳回。If no item is selected, an empty string ("") is returned. 您也可以使用屬性，以選取中的項目控制項，藉由設定項目的值。You can also use the property to select an item in the control by setting it with the value of the item. 如果中沒有項目控制項包含指定的值、擲回例外狀況。If no items in the control contain the specified value, an exception is thrown. 控制項開發人員可以覆寫屬性，以支援不相關的功能屬性。Control developers can override the property to support features that are not related to the property. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

Public Custom Event TextChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 當 和 屬性變更時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the and properties change.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時和屬性變更。The event is raised when the and properties change. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在覆寫方法在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫方法的基底類別，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void TrackViewState ();
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void TrackViewState() cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub TrackViewState ()
protected: override void TrackViewState();

summary.span: 標記起始點，從這個點開始追蹤並儲存 衍生控制項的檢視狀態變更。

span.span: Marks the starting point to begin tracking and saving view-state changes to a -derived control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會覆寫來標示的起點開始追蹤並儲存變更至控制項的控制項檢視狀態的一部分。This method is overridden to mark the starting point to begin tracking and saving changes to the control as part of the control's view state. > [!NOTE] > 在擴充主要由控制項開發人員使用這個方法。This method is used primarily by control developers when extending .

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string ValidationGroup { get; set; }
.property instance string ValidationGroup
Public Overridable Property ValidationGroup As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ValidationGroup { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定控制項群組，衍生自 類別的控制項會在回傳至伺服器時，針對這個群組進行驗證。

span.span: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the control that is derived from the class causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 控制項群組，衍生的 會在回傳至伺服器時，針對這個群組進行驗證。

span.span: The group of controls for which the derived causes validation when it posts back to the server.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 驗證群組可讓您將驗證頁面上的控制項指派給特定的類別。Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category. 每個驗證群組可以在頁面上的其他驗證群組從獨立進行驗證。Each validation group can be validated independently from other validation groups on the page. 使用屬性設為其指定的驗證群組名稱衍生自控制項類別會驗證在回傳至伺服器時。Use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control that is derived from the class causes validation when it posts back to the server. 屬性沒有作用時，才值屬性設定為`true`。The property has an effect only when the value of the property is set to `true`. 當您指定的值屬性，只是指定群組的成員驗證控制項的驗證時控制項回傳至伺服器。When you specify a value for the property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 如果您未指定的值屬性和屬性設定為`true`，控制項回傳至伺服器時，會驗證所有驗證控制項在頁面上驗證群組未指派。If you do not specify a value for the property and the property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual void VerifyMultiSelect ();
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void VerifyMultiSelect() cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Sub VerifyMultiSelect ()
protected public: virtual void VerifyMultiSelect();

summary.span: 判斷清單控制項是否支援多重選取模式。

span.span: Determines whether the list control supports multiselection mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不會執行任何動作是否支援多重選取。The method does nothing if multiselection is supported. 否則，會擲回例外狀況。Otherwise, it throws an exception.

span.span: is set to .
